00032 MonodomainTissue<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>::MonodomainTissue(
00033             AbstractCardiacCellFactory<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* pCellFactory)
00034     :  AbstractCardiacTissue<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>(pCellFactory)
00035 {
00036 }

00040                                                  AbstractTetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* pMesh)
00041         :  AbstractCardiacTissue<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>(rCellsDistributed, pMesh)
